prompt:

Correct speech recognition errors and inconsistencies based on context.

Note that the original timestamps should be PRESERVED for each entry.

PLEASE DON'T CHANGE ORIGINAL TIMESTAMPS.

Subtitles to process:
[
  {
    "start": "00:00:00,000",
    "end": "00:00:02,320",
    "lang": "zh",
    "text": "邊行車台"
  },
  {
    "start": "00:00:02,320",
    "end": "00:00:02,420",
    "lang": "zh",
    "text": "經過富士山"
  },
  {
    "start": "00:00:02,420",
    "end": "00:00:03,060",
    "lang": "zh",
    "text": "有金毛巨itis"
  },
  {
    "start": "00:00:06,114",

    "text": "Not bad,"
  },
  {
    "start": "00:00:07,014",
    "end": "00:00:07,294",
    "lang": "en",
    "text": "not bad at all."
  }
]

Output JSON format only:
```json
[
  {
    "start": "timestamp",
    "end": "timestamp",
    "vi": "Vietnamese text"
  }
]
```
